main event: At 1130Q on 8 April 1953, several persons stationed at Fort Buchanan, San Juan Puerto Rico observed an unidentified flying object variously described as a 'bright star', 'bright ball', 'bright ball of fire,' at a great height.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10-15 minutes., The object was seen moving at high speed and had a spinning or revolving motion., The reported altitude of the object was higher than 12,000 feet., Two RB-36 aircraft were in the area at the time of the sighting., The object lost in close proximity to the sun during the observation.
sighted object: unidentified flying object described as a bright light
witness description: various personnel stationed at Fort Buchanan
